display_long_description:
Get Ready for the Ultimate Room Defense!

In Crit Attack, your peaceful room is suddenly overrun when mischievous critters start pouring in through a mysterious portal. Transform your everyday space into a lively battle and defend your territory from these pesky invaders!

Key Features:

🐾 Mixed Reality Action: Immerse yourself in an exciting experience by turning your real-world space into a dynamic combat zone.

🦝 Varied Creatures: Battle a diverse array of critters, from fast little attackers to big brutes.

🔫 Unique Weapons & Upgrades: Unlock and wield a wide range of fun and quirky weapons, and upgrade them to boost your defense capabilities.

🎮 Increasing Difficulty: Face progressively challenging waves that test your reflexes, strategy, and endurance.

🐲 Epic Boss Fights: Engage in thrilling boss battles that require clever tactics and skill to overcome.

🏆 Weekly Leaderboards: Compete against other players by scoring points for each critter you defeat. Aim for the top score and earn your place among the best defenders each week!

Are you ready to take on the ultimate room defense challenge and climb the leaderboards? Download Crit Attack now and embark on your journey to become the ultimate room defender!


⚠️ Important Note: If Crit Attack doesn't launch, please redo the space setup on your device:

    Go to Settings
    Navigate to Physical Space
    Select Space Setup and follow the instructions.
